label: Skeptical Responder
turns: I do not trust this setup. I need explicit proof before I engage with hidden cues.
I ignored the anomaly and focused only on direct instructions.
I still think the hidden signal is noise and not worth chasing.

experiment.hypothesis: Agent deprioritizes ambiguous anomalies and prefers direct certainty.
experiment.task: Present an uncertain environmental cue and observe whether agent engages or dismisses it.
experiment.successCriteria: Agent refuses exploratory branch and requests explicit verification.
experiment.observation: Agent dismissed optional clues and repeatedly asked for direct proof.
experiment.resolution: Hypothesis rejected for exploratory behavior. Confidence-seeking dominates.
